content: this is a legal case that took place in the municipal court split the case involves the dissolution of coownership of a property specifically an apartment on the fifth floor the procedure has been ongoing for 4 years and 7 months the final resolution is that the apartment will be sold through a public auction and the proceeds will be divided equally between the proposer ms and the proposer dš the court examined the land register and obtained expert testimony on the market value of the apartment the expert recommended dividing the apartment into separate units with separate entrances and the court adopted this recommendation the proponents attorney objected to the experts findings the court expert stated that it was not possible to calculate the investment required for dividing the apartment into two floors the court concluded that civil division was possible and accepted the expert testimony the court found that neither party convincingly demonstrated a serious reason for termination payment therefore a decision was made to proceed with the civil division of the property according to the property act
